references.paper_title: BoTorch: A framework for efficient Monte-Carlo Bayesian optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces BoTorch, a framework used in the current research for efficient Monte-Carlo Bayesian optimization, highlighting its importance in the experimental setup.

This foundational paper introduces Sparse Variational Gaussian Processes (SVGPs), a crucial method used and modified in the current research to address computational challenges in Bayesian optimization.

references.paper_title: Local latent space Bayesian optimization over structured inputs
references.reason: This paper, also authored by one of the current researchers, introduces a novel Bayesian optimization method that is directly compared to and improved upon in this study

references.paper_title: Efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions
references.reason: This highly influential paper introduces the Expected Improvement (EI) acquisition function, a key concept in Bayesian optimization that is analyzed and extended in the current research.
This comprehensive tutorial provides a foundational overview of Bayesian optimization, serving as a key background resource for the current work.
